attr.title: FreeSerf
attr.desc: FreeSerf is a faithful clone of the brilliant simulation game The Settlers 1 aka Serf City.
attr.inst: In order to play you need to copy the DOS data file is called SPAE.PA, SPAD.PA, SPAF.PA, or SPAU.PA, depending on the language of the game; or Amiga files gfxheader, gfxfast, gfxchip, gfxpics, sounds, and music. into ports/freeserf folder.
